changes.description: Add LiteLLM chat and embedding model providers.
Add LoggerFactory and clean up related API.
Add config for NLP async mode.
Add optional input documents to indexing API.
Add gpt-5 support by updating fnllm dependency.
Fix all human_readable_id fields to be 0-based.
Make cache, storage, and vector_store factories consistent with similar registration support
generate_text_embeddings only loads tables if embedding field is specified.
